thread.title: Drake Offers Ticket Refund After Travis Scott Falls On Stage In London
thread.title_full: Drake Offers Ticket Refund After Travis Scott Falls On Stage In London

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Drake Offers Ticket Refund After Travis Scott Falls On Stage In London

organizations.name: travis scott falls on stage in london

text:
Home > Music > Drake Offers Ticket Refund After Travis Scott Falls On Stage In London Drake Offers Ticket Refund After Travis Scott Falls On Stage In London 0 0 4 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 1, 2017 at 11:04pm Following Travis Scott's epic fall on stage, Drake has offered a refund for concert goers in London. 
As we reported a little while ago , Drake & Young Thug decided to surprise fans on the Boy Meets World Tour in London Wednesday night by bringing out special guest Travis Scott to perform such tracks as “Goosebumps”, “Antidote”& of course his smash hit with Thugger “Pick Up The Phone.” However, while performing his song “Goosebumps,” Travis had a little accident & fell into a massive hole on stage causing damage to the giant globe & set beneath him in the process. 
While Travis recalled the mishap as “by far one of the most turnt and epic shit ever,” it appears Drizzy was feelings some type of way with the slip up and told audience that he would make the show free for them. 
“I’m doing this s**t for free tonight. I don’t give a f**k,” announced the rapper. It is still not confirmed whether the 6 God was joking or actually serious about refunding the tickets, but what we do know is that Travis' fall undeniably epic 
Peep the fan-captured footage (below). Travis Scott fell at Drake LMAO pic.twitter.com/My7Fc9T6xx
